abstract: Susan M Novick reviews Hurricane Grill and Wings in Syosset (Metropolitan/Long Island).
snippet: Several Florida-based chains have recently expanded their presence on Long Island, their brands often familiar to Long Islanders who spend time in Florida.
lead_paragraph: Several Florida-based chains have recently expanded their presence on Long Island, their brands often familiar to Long Islanders who spend time in Florida.

headline.main: For Restaurant Chains, Some Far-Off Links
